    • withTags

      public DatadogReporter.Builder withTags(List<String> tags)
      Tags that would be sent to datadog with each and every metrics. This could be used to set global metrics like version of the app, environment etc.
      Parameters:
      tags - List of tags eg: [env:prod, version:1.0.1, name:kafka_client] etc

    • withPrefix

      public DatadogReporter.Builder withPrefix(String prefix)
      Prefix all metric names with the given string.
      Parameters:
      prefix - The prefix for all metric names.

      public DatadogReporter.Builder convertDurationsTo(TimeUnit durationUnit)

    • withTransport

      public DatadogReporter.Builder withTransport(Transport transport)
      The transport mechanism to push metrics to datadog. Supports http webservice and UDP dogstatsd protocol as of now.
      See Also:
      • HttpTransport
      • UdpTransport
